page.title: 10Playground games
page.content: There are usually several games of {football}going on in the playground at the same time so it is very hard to play your own game.You get your footballs muddled so you have to make up your own rules.If you are in{goal} you{throw}the ball instead of{kicking it out of your hand.If someone who is playing another game{blocks}the ball we have to decide if it is a{penalty} or not. { Moving Targets}is a game for a group of people.You stand next to a{wall}and {dodge}a{ball}thrown at you.If you get hit it's your turn to throw the ball. You can use spongeballs,tennisballs and footballs.You can play it in the winter with softly packed{snowballs}. You can play it inside or out. You can play it on a bench. You can play it standing next to a piece of wood, which is dangerous.
